field.name: description
field.value:
This patch does the following:
1. Bug 69 - turns on "Option Strict On" if the (VB) project's settings have that on.
2. If the generic IList type is used for relations, it adds a object initialiser to the field declaration.
3. While it doesn't fix bug 70 it also adds references to project referenced assemblies for the codedom compiler, which I think should help with the final fix.
4. Fix the namespace prefix from bug 63.
5. Use regular expression to trim property names (bug 72)
6. use project references to fine NHIbernate assembly
